allow: Bash(python -c "from qdrant_client import QdrantClient; print\([m for m in dir\(QdrantClient\) if not m.startswith\(''_''\)]\)")
Bash(python -c "from qdrant_client import QdrantClient; print\([m for m in dir\(QdrantClient\) if ''search'' in m.lower\(\)]\)")

Bash(python -c "from qdrant_client import QdrantClient; import inspect; print\(''Available search methods:''\); [print\(m\) for m in dir\(QdrantClient\) if ''search'' in m.lower\(\) or ''query'' in m.lower\(\)]")
